content.description: Sit start on a little crimp rail with a heel hook, and traverse straight left out small sloping edges with a big move to a couple of bad slopers and a mantel.
content.location:
This is on the lowball face on

Agent Orange

Boulder, located on opposite side of boulder from the main prow.

content.description:
Sit start compressing your right hand on the start of

Agent Orange

and your left hand around the corner. Squeeze up to the sloper lip, working rightwards to top out.
content.location:
It is on the left-hand side of the

Agent Orange

Boulder, opposite

Under the Sea

overhang.

On Agent Orange Boulder, this is the clean prow located just around the corner from

Pocket Change

, opposite

Under the Sea

overhang.

content.description:
Stand start with opposed slopers. Start with a head-height right-hand and a low (below head-height) left hand.

Variation: use the same right hand hold, but put your left hand on a high (above head-height) opposed sloper on a prow (V8/9). I think the lower version is the more classic of the two starts.
content.location:
On Agent Orange Boulder, this is the clean prow located just around the corner from

Pocket Change

, opposite

Under the Sea

overhang.
